snippet: Behind two goals by Carli Lloyd, the United States defeated Japan to avenge last year’s loss in the World Cup final and win its fourth gold medal in women’s soccer.
abstract: United States women's soccer team get their payback against Japan, to whom they lost the World Cup finals in 2011, beating them in a tense and taut Olympic gold medal match, 2-1; Carli Lloyd scores both US goals and goaltender Hope Solo makes clutch saves.
lead_paragraph: Behind two goals by Carli Lloyd, the United States defeated Japan to avenge last year’s loss in the World Cup final and win its fourth gold medal in women’s soccer.

headline.seo: Payback in Gold as U.S. Beats Japan to Win in Women’s Soccer
headline.main: United States Wins Women’s Soccer Gold
headline.content_kicker: Women's Soccer: Final | United States 2, Japan 1
